Title: The Survivalist
Actors: Martin McCann, Mia Goth, Olwen Fouéré, Douglas Russell
Plot: In a kill-or-be-killed world where starvation is rife and strangers are always dangerous, The Survivalist lives off the grid, and by his wits. When a starving woman and her teenage daughter discover his forest refuge, his loneliness drives him to overcome his suspicion and strike a bargain with them in return for bed and board. But as desire becomes stronger than necessity, the exchange becomes an uneasy, ongoing arrangement which threatens not only his carefully constructed world but also his life.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 10 nominations.
